REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to preference given to an appeal to the appellate division of the supreme court regarding a denial of an exception from disclosure
Summary: Relates to preference given to an appeal to the appellate division of the supreme court regarding a denial of an exception from disclosure.
LawCode: Amd ยง89, Pub Off L; amd R5521, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to preference given to an appeal to the appellate division of the supreme court regarding a denial of an exception from disclosure
